resources.string: Welcome to the ASTQB Certfication quiz. Select or enter the most appropriate answer(s) for each question. When you are finished, tap the Submit Answers button to get your score.
Which of the following are causes of errors? Choose all that apply.
Testing can prove there are no defects in a system.
If the same tests are repeated over and over again, eventually these tests no longer find new defects. What is the name for this term?
Which test activity answers the question \"How to test?\"
